title: Did the ‘Benadryl Challenge’ Prompt Warnings of Overdose Risk?
subtitle: The internet dare that went viral in 2020 joined a long list of dangerous challenges that have targeted teenagers on social media.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The so-called “Benadryl Challenge” went viral on TikTok in 2020, challenging teenagers to overdose on the allergy medication to elicit hallucinatory effects, prompting warnings from medical experts over the potential risk of overdose death.
